no_context.I want to register an account: I want to register an account
no_context.Name: Name
no_context.Your account has been registered success: Your account has been registered successfully. Activation link has been sent to your mailbox. Click it to make the final activation.
no_context.Cannot use password recovery system whil: Cannot use password recovery system while being logged in!
no_context.Message has been sent on your e-mail add: Message has been sent on your e-mail address. Click on the link from it's content to recover password to your account.
no_context.Your password has been successfully chan: Your password has been successfully changed to the new one.
no_context.Your profile has been modified successfu: Your profile has been modified successfully.
no_context.This value can contain only letters, num: This value can contain only letters, numbers and "-" or "_" characters.
no_context.Enter new password for Your account:: Enter new password for Your account:
no_context.An error occurred while recovering acces: An error occurred while recovering access to your account. The reason may be one of the following points
no_context.recovery operation has already been made: recovery operation has already been made under this link;
no_context.link from the e-mail was not fully copie: link from the e-mail was not fully copied into your browser's address field.
no_context.If none of the above reasons does not so: If none of the above reasons does not solve the problem, please contact us via the :contact section.
no_context.Enter Your e-mail address to recover acc: Enter Your e-mail address to recover access to Your account.
no_context.We were asked to change password on your: We were asked to change password on your account registered on :site_name site. To do this, click on the link below:
no_context.If the above operation is not made by yo: If the above operation is not made by you, report it to us through the :contact section.
no_context.You have entered wrong username or passw: You have entered wrong username or password. Try again.
no_context.You have successfully logged out from th: You have successfully logged out from the site.
no_context.This field is used for a security purpos: This field is used for a security purposes.
no_context.to.many.incorrect.logins: To many incorrect login attempts. You must wait a while to be able to login.
